name: SpiderWar
description:
Defend your nest from spider-eating wasps for as long as possible, check high score

Controls: 

      -WASD To move around the tree

      -Mouse to look around

      -Mouse click to shoot

Just a small project between a recent grad student and a high school student. Was a lot of fun!

Jose L. Redondo Tello
